recover: Mix dry ingredients..Mix oil, sugar and eggs. Add flour mixture to wet until moistened. Fold in nuts and chips.
reference: Wash, stem and slice mushrooms..slice stems and boil in 3/4 cup water for 8 to 10 minutes for mushroom stock..saute the sliced mushroom caps in 3 tablespoons butter or margarine..melt remaining butter or margarine blend in flour and salt and slowly stir in the milk, half and half and mushroom stock..boil until thick, stirring constantly..add sauteed mushrooms and sherry.
source: 准备:牛奶一杯白蘑菇切小块洋葱横切成圈圈海鲜开水调2分钟,控干。酱汁:牛奶一半蘑菇丁放入打碎机打成酱汁,倒出。放入1小勺盐,半小勺黑胡椒,半勺鸡精可无调和即完成。热锅,放一小勺左右的黄油,加入海鲜和米酒翻炒1分钟,加入洋葱,蘑菇和一半酱汁继续炒软,倒入所有的酱汁,加一小

reference: Place garlic cloves, 1/4 cup olive oil, key lime juice, rosemary, and 1/2 teaspoon garlic salt into a blender puree until smooth. combine shrimp and marinade in a resealable plastic bag. marinate at least 30 minutes in the refrigerator..place an oven rack in the topmost position and preheat oven on the broil setting..pour the shrimp and their marinade onto a baking sheet lined with aluminum foil. broil in preheated oven 3 to 4 minutes per side until the shri
source: 准备食材。蒜末油里炸到有点金光,放青豆。青豆和蒜一起炒,炒,炒,炒,炒到香喷喷装盘。其他各种食材水煮,装盘,淋柠檬汁,加盐,加黑胡椒,蛋对半切开加酱油,黑胡椒。吃

recover: Sprinkle pork chops with salt and pepper. In a bowl, mix the remaining ingredients except noodles and let it marinate for 30 minutes to overnight in the refrigerator..Drain the broth. Add tomato paste and seasonings to taste. Simmer the soup covered for 20 minutes or until thickened and bubbly. You may add additional water if you use heavy cream if needed.
reference: Boil the eggs in water for approx 8 minutes, depending on size..lift the eggs out and place in cold water..to the water in the pot add the salt, soy, star anise, five spice powder and tea..when eggs are cool enough to handle, gently crack the shells with the back of a spoon until the entire shell is a network of cracks, do not peel.bring the water in the pot back to the boil, and return the eggs to the pot, they need to be covered
source: 这是原作者。这是原配方。我偷懒,截图。嗯嗯。嗯。第二天早上我又烧开了一遍。

recover: Preheat oven to 350°F. Spray two 8x8 inch loaf pans with nonstick cooking spray..In a large bowl, whisk together eggs and water, stirring until well blended. Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 20 minutes or longer. Let cool in pan 10 minutes before removing from pan to wire racks. Cut into squares and place on baking sheet. Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes more. Turn off oven and let stand 15 minutes. Using tongs, brush pan with egg mixture. Drizzle with
reference: Due to availability in my area, i usually buy frozen scallops..in that case you must defrost them, remove the tough muscle from the edge of each scallop, rinse them one by one to get rid of any sand, and finally pat them dry..now that they are clean and dry, dredge them in the flour..set the scallops aside while you prep the remaining ingredients.first, cut the tomatoes into thin slices or small cubes..then peel and crush the garlic
source: 司康作为下午茶点也合适不过了。。低粉、糖、盐、泡打粉倒入大碗中充分搅拌混合均匀,蔓越莓干提前用葡萄酒或郞姆酒或者水浸泡变软后再用厨房纸吸干水分。。加入淡奶油,边加边翻拌和压拌,面粉基本成团就可以了,淡奶油不一定用完,面团宁干勿湿。。将面团移至面板上,加入浸泡好的蔓越莓干,用按压的方式将蔓越

recover: Cook potatoes, cut up, in a bowl, stirring occasionally. Add salt, pepper and onion, mixing well..Add chicken, tomatoes and bouillon cubes to pot with all ingredients except soup and milk. Mix well and set aside.
reference: Combine and beat well with rotary beater.
source: 煮面,不能太软,过凉开水,倒点橄榄油防粘,可以散开放切水果板上冷置,装盆放冰箱冷藏。。蒜瓣拍碎,葱切碎,放点芝麻,倒入热油。加酱油,耗油,醋,感觉酸了,兑了点开水。汁成了。。面放大碗,放入切丝的黄瓜,焯水的豆芽,花生米,香菜,芝麻油,芝麻沙拉酱,拌啊拌,吃吧。我

recover: Preheat oven to 350°..Cook meat in oil until brown on both sides. Drain. Mix in remaining ingredients. Add tomatoes and potatoes. Simmer about 15 minutes or longer. Serve over cooked, drained meat.
reference: Preheat the oven to 400°f. put the peppers in a lightly oiled baking dish and bake them for about 12 minutes. take them out of the oven and put them in a freezer bag. seal it and set it aside..heat the olive oil in a large frying pan and fry the onions and garlic and saute them briefly. add the eggplant and tomato and simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring from time to time. remove the skins and seeds from the peppers and dice them. add them to the pan with
source: 素肉,茭白,胡萝卜切丁起油锅,下胡萝卜和毛豆翻炒,断生后下茭白和素肉丁炒至8分熟,下豆瓣酱,炒匀后加水,略煮几分钟加糖调味,勾薄芡,起锅。开水加盐,煮面12分钟左右。捞出沥水,装盘。加素肉酱拌匀,随意配些绿叶蔬菜,ok

recover: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F..Place fish in a large baking dish. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over fish. Bake for 1 hour, turning and basting occasionally with melted butter.
reference: Wash and cut strawberries into half or quarters..sprinkle bananas with few drops lemon juice..add strawberry glaze and chill.
source: 草莓对半切开,香蕉切片,摆盘。挤点沙拉酱。好啦又好看又美味的水果沙拉好啦

recover: 1. Cook the rice as directed on package..2. Place the water, cinnamon stick and mustard seeds in a small bowl and whisk to blend..3. In another bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, and pepper..4. Add the coconut milk and stir to mix well..5. Pour the milk mixture into chicken broth. Combine all ingredients in large bowl toss gently to coat evenly. Put the cooked quinoa and vegetables into the broccoli and bake for 15-18 minutes or until tender.
reference: Steam the fish and tatto it.blend the union, garlic, chili, cayenne pepper, terasi optional with a few water.stir fry the chili until no water on pan and input the fish..cook until scented..set aside..put in to bowl, flour, starch, garlic, pepper, salt,.add a few hot water.put for a few dough.input the fish on the dough, then closed it.input the fish until finished.fry it until brown.ready
source: 先把大米洗净后倒入清水浸泡6个小时以上。然后把大米和三个鸡蛋,生姜还有适量的清水倒入豆浆机里。选择果蔬冷饮就可以,如果过分稠了,再加一点点水就可以,然后再选择果蔬冷饮即可,不能稀,否则就做不了了。然后就是生南瓜直接切丝即可。豆芽切段,洗净过一下热水,烫烫就好,如果你不喜欢软的,就不用烫了。把磨好的浆倒入盆里,

recover: Preheat oven to 350°..Mix ingredients together and bake for 15 minutes.
reference: Dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup warm water..set this aside..in a large mixing bowl combine these ingredients.warm water, eggs, salt, sugar, shortening, flour..mix and add dissolved yeast to above ingredients..add enough flour to make a soft dough..turn dough onto a floured board..like making bread..place back in large bowl and cover with damp cloth..let rise until double in size..punch down and divide in half..roll out one of the
source: 准备食材。面粉,玉米粉,酵母放入面包机中加入水,选择发面功能,发成面团。发好面团,揉面排气后取小块,揉搓成圆柱形,切均匀小块,擀成面皮取5个面皮从上往下摆好,筷子在中间压印。从上往下卷起,卷好后对半切开。修饰一下花瓣,玫瑰花就做好了。上蒸锅,冷水小火加热到水温50

recover: Mix crumbs, margarine, sugar and butter..Press firmly onto bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool.
reference: Heat oven to 300 degrees fahrenheit..spray a 9 inch springform pan with cooking spray..in food processor, place cottage cheese, egg substitute, sugar, cream cheese, cocoa and vanilla..process until smooth..pour into prepared pan..bake 35-40 minutes or until edges are set and center is not jiggly it may crack..cool completely..cover, refrigerate until chilled..remove side of pan and serve.
source: 首先制作巧克力蛋糕。将黑巧克力我用的纽扣状黑巧克力,如果你用的是块状黑巧克力,需要将它切碎和切成小块的黄油一起放入碗里,微波炉加热或隔热水加热到足够的温度,不断搅拌直到黄油和巧克力完全融化成为黄油巧克力液。。在黄油巧克力液里加入室温的淡奶油淡奶油提前取出回温。。彻底搅拌均匀,将得到的巧克力
